title: Which is better, morning or night study? Whenever I study in the morning I feel sleepy in classes and rest day is wasted, but when I study late I don't feel this. - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey…same problem I face!! I am a sleepy person and I cant wake up early in the morning , not for studies at least. And hence reading your problem , I would suggest you to start studying at night. Tips:-  #keep your study room well-lighted. #Sit on the chair and avoid sitting on bed. #Avoid heavy dinner. #Keep drinking alot of water. #When you feel sleepy ,then start reading your chapter out loud. #Be clear and figure out what to study . #Avoid distraction  #keep your phone switched off while studying.  #Chew gum or suck on a mint.  # Draw or doodle.. All the best✌
If it's so .. then enjoy your night study . I would suggest if you sleep on time in night you will start to enjoy morning study too and it will start your day beautifully.
